Priority is to exclude a surgically remediable aneurysm causing the pupil-involving third nerve palsy, then characterise the extent and nature of CNS lesions to confirm demyelination and rule out structural or systemic mimics, while obtaining baseline tests relevant to steroids and potential disease-modifying therapy.
